thread.section_title: Amalfi Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: DREAM
thread.title_full: DREAM - Review of Amalfi Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: antonp986
title: DREAM
text:
Fantastic service and a great location. You can visit the most of Rome's highlights by foot. Take your time... look around.. take unexpected turn and you will find such a great surprises.. small streets, magical details.. You will not believe what you see!! DREAM
Special thanks to the Russian lady taking care of the breakfast: The best coffee ever!!! :) What a service PERFECT
